Father, we love you. We thank you for loving us. I pray God that you'd help us. We acknowledge this evening that we cannot in our own flesh, in our own power, begin to fulfill this piece of instruction that you've given us in your word. It's absolutely going to be only achievable as we walk in the spirit, as we crucify the flesh, as we're filled with the spirit of God. And I pray, Lord, that you'd help us to daily, daily, as Paul said, I die daily, daily that we would say, I am crucified with Christ, that we'd be emptied of self, filled with your spirit, that we'd be able to, with your help and by your grace, obey this instruction, to be patient toward all men.
